alert.note: Alert for Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 08 at 2:21PM MDT until September 08 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * IMPACTS: Low Humidities...Unseasonably Warm Temperatures... Strong Gusty Winds...and Wind Shift with a Cold Front will create erratic fire behavior and new fire starts. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY...Fire Weather Zones 283 and 289. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont...Natrona. In Southwest WY...Sweetwater. * COLD FRONT: A cold front will sweep across the Wind River Basin between 5 PM and 8 PM, bringing an abrupt wind shift from the north. * WIND: Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * THUNDERSTORMS: Isolated thunderstorms are possible along the cold front this afternoon and evening. * HUMIDITY: As low as 18 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the mid 80s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin
